divs: sighting detailsdriving with companion in car, in wooded area of rt 23n mts on lhs. area of new foundland\sparta area just before stockholm. noticed ofject in sky flying across rt 23 to mt range. 9pm or alittle after, about 200 ft in air. night time. very large triangular shape, moving very slowly, bright light in front and "markers" on it with a strange bright light on the bottom or side in a long line pattern. no sound. first came at a steady pace, when we noticed it it seemed to slow down, then speed up to the mts.
Summary: Rt 23 nightime triangular approx 200ft multiple lights moving slowly to mts well over 1000 ft
trends: there have been no other sightings in new foundland\sparta\rt 2
This sighting has never been favorited.
